title: The lives of Dr. John Donne, Sir Henry Wotton, Mr. Richard Hooker, Mr. George Herbert written by Izaak Walton ; to which are added some letters written by Mr. George Herbert, at his being in Cambridge : with others to his mother, the Lady Magdalen Herbert ; written by John Donne, afterwards dean of St. Pauls.
author: Walton, Izaak, 1593-1683.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Tho. Newcomb for Richard Marriott ...,
